description: Comprehensive Mathematics Learning System - Concept learning with proofs and examples across all mathematical disciplines
author: Professional Mathematics Curriculum

math_learning_data_geometry.json.description: Geometry: Euclidean Geometry, Coordinate Geometry, Solid Geometry, Transformations

math_learning_data_trigonometry.json.description: Trigonometry: Ratios, Identities, Graphs, Inverse Functions, Applications

math_learning_data_calculus.json.description: Calculus: Limits, Differentiation, Integration, Differential Equations

math_learning_data_statistics.json.description: Statistics & Probability: Descriptive Statistics, Probability, Distributions

math_learning_data_discrete.json.description: Discrete Mathematics: Logic, Sets, Relations, Graph Theory, Combinatorics
